description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o quinto Ano Lunar. O quinto Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Dragão.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第五地支辰，该年的生肖为龙。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Drachen aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Angriffskraft um 320.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.fr: Une Cape magnifiquement conçue, ornée d'un symbole qui représente la cinquième Année Lunaire. La cinquième Année Lunaire est dédiée au Dragon.
description.id: Jubah yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Lunar Year kelima. Lunar Year kelima ini didedikasikan untuk Naga.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.jp: 5番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。5番目の旧正月は龍に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 5 년을 상징하는 상징으로 장식 된 아름답게 제작 된 망토. 음력 5 년은 드래곤에게 헌정됩니다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом пятого года китайского календаря - драконом.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el quinto Año Lunar. El quinto Año Lunar está dedicado al Dragón.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the fifth Lunar Year. The fifth Lunar Year is dedicated to the Dragon.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่ห้า ปีจันทรคติที่ห้าอุทิศให้กับมังกร
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖龍年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí với biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Mùng năm Âm lịch. Mùng 5 Tết dành riêng cho con Rồng.
